Posts.Content: Hi Friends, iam here becos my mother ( Age - 65 years ) , is diagnoised with breast cancer ( High grade, non invasive, insitu ductal carcinoma ) , a month ago let me tell you abt the journey so far - last month she told me that she found a lump in her breaset , i just checked with hand and noticed it could be around 5 CM in lenght and 3 cm wide we went to oncologist, he did fine needle byopcy - the report said ( it is in fravour of insitu ductal carcinoma ) then for 5 days he prescribed - antibiotic tablets - ( augmentin 625 mg , 3 times a day ) we went to him after a week, he found that redness decreased, however wanted to confirm once more, so he did tru cut byopsy the report came after 5 days and said it is just infection and not cancer we continued the antibiotic for other 5- 10 days and went to him, the lump was still there so he did biopsy ( opened and removed a small piece ) , after 5 days the report came and it says its facorable High grade, non invasive, insitu ductal carcinoma ) the onco sergeon suggested we shuld do masstectomy next week ( 12/20 ) i read about graviola fruit , that it cures cancer, luckly i found it at fruit marker, from last three days we are giving her the juice ( 3 times a day - 100 ml approx ) did anyone got cured by eating this fruit ? do i go for one more biopsy at a different diagnostic center to re-confirm ? any suggestions and help will be highly appreciable Thanks and Merry Christmas to everyone
Posts.Title: Hello friends, Iam From INDIA - Breast cancer to mom

Posts.Content: Mom got Mastectomy yesturday, do you people think it will solve the issue completly ? what care do i need to take more than usual ? Any suggestions are welcome which can help her recover Thank you Tanoj
Posts.Title: Hello friends, Iam From INDIA - Breast cancer to mom
